ShortDescription.Value: Easy change of max capacity of all Transit Depots and Total Passengers

Publish.LongDescription:
### Adjust Transit Capacity (Redux)
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC
### What it does
- **Depots**: change the maximum vehicles per Depot type (Bus, Taxi, Tram, Train, Subway) - **Passengers**: increase how many passengers each vehicle can carry (bus, tram, trains, subway, airplane, ship, ferry) - **Sliders** can be adjusted without restarting (up to 10x of vanilla default values). - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, making it more compatible and less likely to break with game updates.
## 8 Languages
- Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian - 한국어 Korean, 日本語 Japanese, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
### Notes - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain or spawn (scales off base building, not extensions). - Passenger capacity = maximum passengers each vehicle can carry. - Remove other depot/passenger capacity mods to avoid conflicts (they override each other). - Supports switching cities.
### Credits - River-Mochi - current author/maintainer - Thanks to Wayz author of the original Depot Capacity Changer. - Necko1996 - testing - BugsyG - testing - StarQ for technical support
